description:
On an April night in Tokyo, still too early for fireworks, university student http://anidb.net/ch152842 [Sorano Kakeru] meets a woman named http://anidb.net/ch152840 [Fuyutsuki Koharu]. She is a beautiful girl who stands out from the crowd, laughs a lot, and exudes a warmth that contrasts sharply with Kakero`s own introversion. But there was something Kakero didn`t know at first—she can`t see. Unlike Kakero, Koharu hasn`t given up on anything, even with her blindness. She attends university daily, shows interest in clubs, makes friends—and dreams of launching fireworks one day. Kakero wonders why, when she can`t see them...but maybe it doesn`t matter. And maybe he can start moving forward, too, for the girl who`s always been by his side.
Source: Yen Press

WIKIPEDIA_JP: 透明な夜に駆ける君と、目に見えない恋をした。

titles.title: Toumei na Yoru ni Kakeru-kun to, Me ni Mienai Koi o Shita.
透明な夜に駆ける君と, 目に見えない恋をした.
Love Unseen Beneath the Clear Night Sky
